issue.title: [C#] Fix benchmarking project
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10661](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10661). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After the upgrade to 3.1, the benchmarks stopped working since the version of BenchmarkDotNet used 2.1.

 

Also the writer benchmark reaches the 2gb limit of memory stream which causes an exception.
